languages.text: {n}Равор долго смотрит на вас, а потом хмыкает.{/n} "Ну да. Особо не надо стараться, чтобы заметить, что я не в духе. Если хотите знать, не только я в том виноват".
{n}Ravor gives you a careful look and scoffs.{/n} "Right you are. It's not hard to see that I'm in a foul mood. I'm not the only one to blame for it, you know."
languages.original_text: {n}Равор долго смотрит на вас, а потом хмыкает.{/n} "Ну да. Особо не надо стараться, чтобы заметить, что я не в духе. Если хотите знать, не только я в том виноват".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor gives you a careful look and scoffs.{/n} "Indeed. One does not have to try to see that I am in a foul mood. It's not only my fault, you know."
{n}Ravor gives you a careful look and scoffs.{/n} "Indeed. One does not have to try to see that I am in a foul mood. It's not only my fault, you know."

{n}Ravor gives you a careful look and scoffs.{/n} "Right you are. It's not hard to see that I'm in a foul mood. I'm not the only one to blame for it, you know."
{n}Ravor gives you a careful look and scoffs.{/n} "Right you are. It's not hard to see that I'm in a foul mood. I'm not the only one to blame for it, you know."

languages.text: {n}雷沃认真地打量了你一眼，哼了一声。{/n}“你说得没错，是个人就能看出来我现在心情很差。你也知道，这可不是我一个人的错。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor gives you a careful look and scoffs.{/n} "Right you are. It's not hard to see that I'm in a foul mood. I'm not the only one to blame for it, you know."

traits.locale_text: {n}雷沃认真地打量了你一眼，哼了一声。{/n}“你说得没错，是个人就能看出来我现在心情很差。你也知道，这可不是我一个人的错。”

languages.text: {n}Ravor te mira con cuidado y ríe.{/n} «Tiene razón. Salta a la vista que estoy de mal genio. Pero la culpa de mi mal humor no es solo mía».
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor gives you a careful look and scoffs.{/n} "Right you are. It's not hard to see that I'm in a foul mood. I'm not the only one to blame for it, you know."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor te mira con cuidado y ríe.{/n} «Tiene razón. Salta a la vista que estoy de mal genio. Pero la culpa de mi mal humor no es solo mía».

languages.text: {n}ラヴォアはあなたを注意深く見つめた後、冷笑した。{/n}「そうですね。不機嫌だと思われるのも無理はないでしょう。ですが、私だけが悪いわけではありますまい」
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor gives you a careful look and scoffs.{/n} "Right you are. It's not hard to see that I'm in a foul mood. I'm not the only one to blame for it, you know."

traits.locale_text: {n}ラヴォアはあなたを注意深く見つめた後、嘲笑した。{/n}「そうですね。私が不機嫌だと思われるのも無理はないでしょう。ですが、私だけが悪いわけではありますまい」

languages.text: {n}Ravor mustert dich eingehend und schnaubt verächtlich.{/n} "Ihr habt recht. Es ist nicht schwer zu erkennen, dass ich schlechte Laune habe. Aber das ist nicht allein meine Schuld."
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor gives you a careful look and scoffs.{/n} "Right you are. It's not hard to see that I'm in a foul mood. I'm not the only one to blame for it, you know."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor mustert dich eingehend und schnaubt verächtlich.{/n} "Ihr habt recht. Es ist nicht schwer zu erkennen, dass ich schlechte Laune habe. Aber das ist nicht allein meine Schuld."

languages.text: {n}Ravor vous détaille attentivement, puis ricane.{/n} « Et vous avez tapé dans le mille. Pas besoin d'être grand clerc pour voir que je suis de méchante humeur. Et je ne suis pas le seul responsable de cet état de fait. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor gives you a careful look and scoffs.{/n} "Right you are. It's not hard to see that I'm in a foul mood. I'm not the only one to blame for it, you know."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor vous détaille attentivement, puis ricane.{/n} « Et vous avez tapé dans le mille. Pas besoin d'être grand clerc pour voir que je suis de méchante humeur. Et je ne suis pas le seul responsable de cet état de fait. »

languages.text: {n}Ravor sana dikkatle bakıp dudak büküyor.{/n} "Doğrudur. Aksiliğimi fark etmesi zor değil. Asık suratımın tek suçlusu ben değilim bu arada."
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor gives you a careful look and scoffs.{/n} "Right you are. It's not hard to see that I'm in a foul mood. I'm not the only one to blame for it, you know."
